column5: Do you see the bloodshed in this fell war?
column6: 你是否看到，灭族之战，血流成河？
column9: Have you forgotten our faithful men calling your name?
column10: 难道你忘记了我们 虔心唤汝之名的我们
column15: While I lay down a crimson rose
column17: While holding hands are forced apart
column19: While hopes bog like condemned men
column23: The sky is falling on me
column24: 我的世界 天崩地裂！
column25: As your hand's turning old and weak
column27: I'm giving myself upon to thee
column30: 却成了一份渐渐腐烂的祭品
column33: These grey stone walls are cold and silent
column34: 这些灰色石墙 它们冰冷寂静
